name: Catch The Fox
description:
Can you catch the fox?

Level up and chase more foxes as they run away faster and faster each time you catch them... can you outwit them and catch them all? Each level has altars the foxes run between, as well as each fox having its own personality that determines how often it changes course. There are 3 different types of powerup ruins found across every map that can be activated to aid you in catching foxes: Speedup Ruins, Fox Slowdown Ruins, and Fox Finder Ruins.

Features:

- Chasing foxes through the woods

- Foxes speed up and change color each time you catch them

- 9 different levels with different biomes: Jungle, Forest, Fractal City, Dark Woods, Ocean, and more!

- 34 song soundtrack made by over a dozen artists, customizable in-game playlist to play only the songs you like

- Small and large (1km) maps, with up to 100 foxes!

- Smooth level transitions

- Realistic ambient outdoor soundscapes and real fox sounds

- Interactive 3D menu system

- High scores for each level, unlock new levels as you advance

- Works great with gamepad or keyboard and mouse

- Steam Achievements (Windows only)

- Hang glider jumps: The more airtime you get, the faster the forward boost!

- 2-10 hours to complete, depending on playstyle


It's a massive game of tag, who will win?
